original_title: 度を越えた父親の愛情 近親相姦レ●プ 娘は自分を襲った覆面男の正体が［お父さん］という真実は知らない…。

title: A Father's Love That Went Too Far Fakecest, Rape Daughter Who Doesn't Know The Masked Man Who Raped Her Is Her "Father"
